vulnerabilities.title: Prototype pollution in dotty
vulnerabilities.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in 'dotty' before version 0.1.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service and may lead to remote code execution.

vulnerabilities.title: Prototype Pollution in dotty
vulnerabilities.description: This affects the package dotty before 0.1.2. A type confusion vulnerability can lead to a bypass of CVE-2021-25912 when the user-provided keys used in the path parameter are arrays.
